unnormalised: Arre yaar, aiklay mhunn tyo case State vs. Sharma? Pissudda vostu! Dista Sharma hacher Sec. 307 IPC-achea khal book kela – murder korcheak prayatn. Police walanchem mhonn’nem asa tannem aplea shejaryak danda-n marlem parkingacher zalelya zhogdyantlean. FIR no. asa 123/2024 je local PS-ant file kelam. Court-achi tareek fix kelya 15/09/24. Polleun gheum kitem zata mhunn, umed asa nit mellchi!
normalised: Arre yaar, aikla mhunn to case State versus Sharma? Pishem kaam! Distaa mhunn, Sharmaak book kela Section three hundred and seven of the I-P-C – attempt to murder hache khal. Police waley mhuntaat tannem aplea padoshik dandaan maarla parkingacher zavn zhogddi zalea uprant. F-I-R number asa one hundred and twenty three slash two thousand and twenty four file kela local P-S-ant. Court date tharailea fifteenth september two thousand and twenty four. Polleun gheiaa kitem zata mhunn, umed asa nit favo te poddta mhunn!
text: Arre yaar, aiklay mhunn tyo case State vs. Sharma? Pissudda vostu! Dista Sharma hacher Sec. 307 IPC-achea khal book kela – murder korcheak prayatn. Police walanchem mhonn’nem asa tannem aplea shejaryak danda-n marlem parkingacher zalelya zhogdyantlean. FIR no. asa 123/2024 je local PS-ant file kelam. Court-achi tareek fix kelya 15/09/24. Polleun gheum kitem zata mhunn, umed asa nit mellchi!
